headline: b'At Least 21 Athletes Suspected of Blood Doping: German Prosecutor'

headline: b'IOC Wants Swift and Tough Punishment for Doping Offenders'
snippet: b'International Olympic Committee (IOC) President Thomas Bach on Wednesday demanded swift and tough sanctions for doping offenders -- both athletes and their support staff -- involved in a German-Austrian doping ring.'

headline: b'Christian Pulisic Scores for U.S. Before Leaving With Injury'

headline: b'Admissions Scandal Stokes Hard Questions on Recruited Athletes'
